name: Autumn Fall
description:
Autumn Fall is a short game where you sit down at a café with your cute girlfriend. She says she has something important to tell you... what could it be?

This game features:

  • Three different endings.
  • Funny and deep conversations.
  • Cute pixel art visuals.
  • Lofi beats for a chill atmosphere.
  • A simple but touching backstory.

This game contains mentions of mental health issues. Player discretion is adviced.

Author's note: I made this game in about a week for the Great Harvest Game Jam. It contains a lot of my personal issues, so this game is very dear to my heart. I hope you enjoy it!
